com.opengamma.strata.finance

Interface Product

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, ImmutableBean
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CdsProduct, EquityProduct, FraProduct, FxNonDeliverableForwardProduct, FxProduct, FxSwapProduct, FxVanillaOptionProduct, IborFixingDepositProduct, SwapProduct, SwaptionProduct, TermDepositProduct
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cds, Equity, EquityFuture, ExpandedCds, ExpandedFra, ExpandedFx, ExpandedFxNonDeliverableForward, ExpandedFxSwap, ExpandedIborFixingDeposit, ExpandedSwap, ExpandedTermDeposit, Fra, Fx, FxNonDeliverableForward, FxSwap, FxVanillaOption, GenericFuture, GenericFutureOption, IborFixingDeposit, IborFuture, IborFutureOption, Swap, Swaption, TermDeposit

    public interface Product
extends ImmutableBean
    A financial product that can be traded.

    A product is a high level abstraction applicable to many different types. For example, an Interest Rate Swap is a product, as is a Forward Rate Agreement (FRA).

    A product exists independently from a Trade. It represents the economics of the financial instrument regardless of the trade date or counterparties.

    Implementations must be immutable and thread-safe beans.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.joda.beans.Bean

        metaBean, property, propertyNames
